description.quip: Throw a barrel that explodes when shot
description.t3_desc: +0.4s Displacement and +2 Charges.

description.desc:
Drop a bounce pad in the world that launches any hero.

You explode on landing, dealing Damage to any nearby enemies. The explosion can only occur once per Bounce Pad.
description.quip: Send yourself and others flying
description.t1_desc: -10s Cooldown
description.t2_desc: You and allies gain a +4m/s move speed bonus for 4s on landing
description.t3_desc: +75.0 Stomp Damage. Improve Spirit scaling

info_sections.loc_string:
Drop a bounce pad in the world that launches any hero.

You explode on landing, dealing Damage to any nearby enemies. The explosion can only occur once per Bounce Pad.

description.quip: Grab an enemy and drag them behind you

info_sections.loc_string: #ability_astro_shotgun_toggle_desc
#ability_astro_rifle_desc

description.desc: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.
description.quip: Throws her hat strike and reveal enemies

info_sections.loc_string: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.

description.desc:
Headshots deal bonus Damage and applies a Fading Move Speed penalty. This effect can only occur when off cooldown.

Cooldown is reduced by 50% on NPC hits.
Crackshot ignores range damage fall-off and does not apply to objectives.
description.quip: Deal bonus damage with headshots
description.t1_desc: -25% Fading Move Speed
description.t3_desc: -4s Cooldown on Hero Headshots. -2s on NPC Headshots

info_sections.loc_string:
Headshots deal bonus Damage and applies a Fading Move Speed penalty. This effect can only occur when off cooldown.

Cooldown is reduced by 50% on NPC hits.
Crackshot ignores range damage fall-off and does not apply to objectives.

description.quip: Charge into the fray, dragging enemies along
description.t1_desc: On Hero Collide: +25% Weapon Damage for 8s
description.t2_desc: On Wall Hit: +0.45s Stun Duration

description.quip: Regenerate some of the damage you receive
Smash into enemies from above, stunning them
description.t2_desc: On Hero Hit: +100 Max HP and +15% Fire Rate
description.t3_desc: On cast, become Unstoppable.

description.quip: Drain health from nearby enemies in front of you
Punch someone away from you
description.t2_desc: On Hero Hit: Gain fast spin-up time, 2x weapon range and +40% weapon damage for 9s
description.t3_desc: On Hero Hit: Set Grapple Arm cooldown to 0 and add +100% bullets to your current clip

description.quip: Plant a bomb on an enemy
description.t3_desc: On Attach: -30% Outgoing Damage for 5s

description.quip: Unleash a massive damaging beam
description.t3_desc: Hyper Beam heals Bebop for 65% of its damage on Heroes. 20% on non-hero

description.quip: Pull in a target to you
description.t1_desc: +20% weapon damage against victims for 6s

description.quip: Throw a sticky bomb on an enemy

description.desc: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for Paradox against the victim.
description.quip: Throw a grenade that pulses, dealing damage and slow
description.t3_desc: +40.0 Pulse Damage and +0.75m Radius per pulse.

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for Paradox against the victim.

description.desc: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will be briefly slowed.
description.quip: Create a wall that greatly slows projectiles
description.t1_desc:
+2m Width,
+1m Height
description.t2_desc: +9.0% Max Health Damage on Touch
description.t3_desc: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for 2.5s

info_sections.loc_string: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will be briefly slowed.

description.quip: Charge up your weapon to deal high damage and timestop
description.t2_desc: -8.0s Cooldown and +2s Charge Hold Duration
description.t3_desc: +50% Max Damage Scaling

description.desc: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.
description.quip: Swap positions with an enemy hero.

info_sections.loc_string: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.

description.quip: Release a ground pulse that knocks enemies into the air
description.t1_desc: On Hit: 35% Slow and -35% Fire Rate for 4s
description.t2_desc: On Hit: +30% Bullet Damage Taken for 8s
description.t3_desc: +115.0 Damage and +1 Charge

description.quip: Blink in and out of existence
description.t3_desc: -5s Cooldown and On Buff: +120% Max Ammo

description.desc:
While channeling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby.
You can dash and melee without breaking the channel.
description.quip: Heal yourself and those around you
description.t1_desc: Gain +4m/s movespeed bonus for 8s if Aurora is fully channeled. Gain instantly with 5AP Upgrade.
description.t3_desc: Full move and ability use and additionally heals +2.5% of Max Health per second

info_sections.loc_string:
While channeling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby.
You can dash and melee without breaking the channel.

description.quip: Pull in and stun the enemy team
Deploy a healing spirit
description.t1_desc: +35% Fire Rate on units being healed by Medicinal Specter
description.t3_desc: +3% Max Health regen per second

description.quip: Deploy an automated turret
description.t1_desc: Turrets apply +25% Movement Slow
description.t2_desc: +10m Attack Range and +10% turret fire rate
description.t3_desc: +42.0 Turret DPS and +14s Turret Lifetime

description.desc:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}or{g:citadel_binding:'Ability3'}to erupt the wall early.
description.quip: Conjure a wall to block your foes
description.t1_desc: Removes 1 stamina and amplifies McGinnis's damage by 15% on hit enemies for 7s
description.t3_desc: Adds a 0.75s Stun to enemies hit by Spectral Wall

info_sections.loc_string:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}or{g:citadel_binding:'Ability3'}to erupt the wall early.
Removes 1 stamina and amplifies McGinnis's damage by 15% on hit enemies for 7s

description.desc:
Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.

McGinnis is slowed and is still able to use stamina.
description.quip: Bombard an area with rockets
description.t1_desc: Applies 30% movement slow
description.t3_desc: +23.0 Damage per Rocket and Improved damage scaling

info_sections.loc_string:
Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.

McGinnis is slowed and is still able to use stamina.

description.desc:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
description.quip: Sacrifice some health to launch a damaging bomb
description.t3_desc: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 26.0% of the original damage per second, for 6s.

info_sections.loc_string:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.
Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 26.0% of the original damage per second, for 6s.

description.desc: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.
description.quip: Stack damage amplification on an enemy
description.t2_desc: +28.0 Damage and +4 Blood Shards
description.t3_desc: +7% Damage Amp

info_sections.loc_string: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.

description.desc:
Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your move speed is reduced.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} to give health to friendly Heroes.
description.quip: Steal health from an enemy over time
description.t3_desc: Ability becomes charged and grants +1 Charge

info_sections.loc_string:
Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your move speed is reduced.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} to give health to friendly Heroes.

description.desc: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.
description.quip: Swap your current health with an enemy hero's
description.t2_desc: On cast, +40% Fire Rate for 8s.
description.t3_desc: Silence enemies within 15m for 3s

info_sections.loc_string: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.

description.desc: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.
description.quip: Launch a damaging ball of lightning
description.t3_desc: +65.0 DPS and +1m radius

info_sections.loc_string: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.

description.desc: Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
description.quip: Apply a delayed area stun to an enemy hero

info_sections.loc_string: Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.

description.desc: Strike in front of you with lightning, applying a charge to the unit or area hit. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
description.quip: Apply a delayed area stun

info_sections.loc_string: Strike in front of you with lightning, applying a charge to the unit or area hit. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.

description.desc: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.
description.quip: Create electric arcs with your shots
description.t2_desc: Shock Damage applies -15% Spirit Resist for 8s
description.t3_desc: +12 Shock Damage, improved Spirit scaling, and +3 Max Jumps

info_sections.loc_string: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.

description.desc: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.
description.quip: Fry all enemies in a large area
description.t1_desc: +35% Bullet Resist while channeling Storm Cloud
description.t2_desc: +7s Channel Time and +10m Radius
description.t3_desc: +60.0 DPS and allows movement control

info_sections.loc_string: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.
While channeling, press{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}to mark the targeted area to be struck with a powerful lightning bolt that knocks enemies away after a 0.25s delay. One use per cast.

description.desc: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.
description.quip: Put an enemy to sleep
description.t1_desc: Removes 1 stamina on wake-up
description.t2_desc: -12.0 Cooldown and -60.0% stamina recovery for 6.0s on wake-up
description.t3_desc: Applies -12% Bullet Resist and -40% Fire Rate for 6s on wake-up.

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.

description.desc: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility, but using items does not. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.
description.quip: Fade out of sight
description.t2_desc: After invis, gain +10% Bullet Lifesteal for 8s
description.t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and grants 0.5s of Invincibility

info_sections.loc_string: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility, but using items does not. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.

description.desc: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.
description.quip: Deal increasing bullet damage to a target
description.t1_desc: 55.0 Spirit damage and 15% slow for 2s to target every 20 stacks
description.t2_desc: +40 Max Stacks and +5s Duration

info_sections.loc_string: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.

description.desc: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy and added Bullet Damage.
description.quip: Unleash a flurry of bullets around you
description.t3_desc:
+60% Bullet Evasion and
+3mm/s Dance Movespeed

info_sections.loc_string: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy and added Bullet Damage.

description.desc: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.
description.quip: Tether your enemies to the ground
description.t3_desc: +0.5s Tether Duration and +1m Capture Radius

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.

description.desc: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.
description.quip: Take flight and empower your weapon
description.t1_desc: +50% base Ammo while flying

info_sections.loc_string: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.

description.desc: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.
description.quip: Make a target bleed over time
description.t1_desc: Crow Ricochets up to 2 times towards other enemies within 15m
description.t3_desc: -8% Bullet Resist and -8% Spirit Resist

info_sections.loc_string: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.

description.desc: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1.0s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.
description.quip: Snipe injured targets for massive damage

info_sections.loc_string: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1.0s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.

description.quip: Stun all nearby enemies after a short delay
description.t2_desc: +0.5s Stun Duration and +3m Radius
description.t3_desc:
+105.0 Damage.
On Hero Hit: Heal for 70% of damage

description.quip: Blaze forward, leaving a flame trail in your wake
description.t1_desc: On Hit: -30% Fire Rate for 6s
description.t3_desc: Enable Ability Charges and -15.0s Ability Cooldown

description.quip: Spew napalm that amplifies your damage
description.t2_desc: Napalm Effect: +10% Lifesteal
description.t3_desc: Napalm Effect: +20% Damage Taken and -33% Healing

description.quip: Shoot enemies to set them on fire
description.t1_desc: Burn Effect: -25% Spirit Damage

description.desc: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and progressively reducing their movement and fire rate the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced move speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.
description.quip: Apply an escalating slow
description.t3_desc: Fires 2 additional Arctic Beams toward enemies within 10m of the last target hit

info_sections.loc_string: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and progressively reducing their movement and fire rate the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced move speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.

description.desc:
Kelvin creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press {g:citadel_binding:'Roll'} / {g:citadel_binding:'Crouch'} to travel up or down while in Ice Path.
description.quip: Speed around on a floating path of ice
description.t3_desc: While active, gain +1 Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created. Max of 55 Spirit Power

info_sections.loc_string:
Kelvin creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press {g:citadel_binding:'Roll'} / {g:citadel_binding:'Crouch'} to travel up or down while in Ice Path.

description.desc: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and reducing the move speed of enemies.
description.quip: Damage and slow enemies
description.t2_desc: Frost Grenade now heals 80 HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and reducing the move speed of enemies.

description.desc:
Kelvin freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
Objectives becomes Invulnerable and Frozen under Frozen Shelter.
description.quip: Create an impenetrable healing dome
description.t1_desc: -40% Enemy Fire Rate
description.t3_desc: +50 Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power

info_sections.loc_string:
Kelvin freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
Objectives becomes Invulnerable and Frozen under Frozen Shelter.

description.desc: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.
description.quip: Use your whip to pull yourself to an enemy
description.t2_desc: +20m Cast Range and gain +6 Weapon Damage for 10s
description.t3_desc: +20% Fire Rate to Weapon Bonus Buff

info_sections.loc_string: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.

description.desc: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.
description.quip: Slam down to the ground, damaging enemies
description.t2_desc: Struck enemies are knocked up and slowed by 50% for 3s
description.t3_desc: Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling

info_sections.loc_string: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.

description.desc:
Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.
description.quip: Lift enemies and smash them into the ground
description.t3_desc: Stun enemies in the landing zone for 1.0s

info_sections.loc_string:
Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.

description.quip: Heals from targets ahead of you
description.t1_desc: Apply -35% Move speed for 3s
description.t3_desc: +95.0 Damage and applies -35% Fire Rate

description.desc: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward, damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.
description.quip: Transform yourself into a tornado that lifts enemies

info_sections.loc_string: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward, damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.

description.desc: Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.
description.quip: Apply procs of escalating damage
description.t1_desc: Apply 60% Slow for 0.5s whenever you apply 2x multiplier or higher
description.t2_desc: +2.5s Multiplier Duration and +9.0 Base Damage
description.t3_desc: -0.75s Cooldown Between Multiplier and +4 Max Multiplier
description.passive: Passive: Your shots apply an increasing multiplier on the target. When the multiplier on a target expires or you reach the max, it's consumed and the target suffers Spirit Damage and is briefly revealed on the map. The final damage is the base damage times the multiplier.

info_sections.loc_string: Passive: Your shots apply an increasing multiplier on the target. When the multiplier on a target expires or you reach the max, it's consumed and the target suffers Spirit Damage and is briefly revealed on the map. The final damage is the base damage times the multiplier.
Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.

description.desc: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, stealing max health from enemies over time and applying bullet resist reduction. Applying multiple scarabs to the same enemy will extend the health stealing duration. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective as against non-heroes.
description.quip: Send out scarabs that steal life from enemies

info_sections.loc_string: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, stealing max health from enemies over time and applying bullet resist reduction. Applying multiple scarabs to the same enemy will extend the health stealing duration. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective as against non-heroes.

description.desc: Channeled. Target an ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they were when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain move speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.
description.quip: Teleport to an ally or enemy hero
description.t2_desc: Grants Traveller Buffs to Ally
description.t3_desc: On arrival, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm for 3s.

info_sections.loc_string: Channeled. Target an ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they were when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain move speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.

description.desc: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.
description.quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing from each hit
description.t3_desc: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets Mo & Krill deal +15% Damage to them. Stacks and lasts 16s.

info_sections.loc_string: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.

description.quip: Travel underground, emerging with spin damage
description.t1_desc: Burrow time +3s
description.t2_desc: +75.0 Spin DPS and +2 radius
description.t3_desc: -19.0 Cooldown and +2m/s Move Speed

description.desc: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you.
description.quip: Disarm enemies in front of you
description.t3_desc: Slow targets by -40%

info_sections.loc_string: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you.

description.desc: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during, or within 3 seconds of Combo ending, you permanently gain max health.
description.quip: Hold the enemy hero in place and pummel them
description.t1_desc: +30% Bullet Resist during Combo
description.t2_desc: Combo Duration +0.75s
description.t3_desc: +35.0 Damage Per Second and 80% lifesteal

info_sections.loc_string: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during, or within 3 seconds of Combo ending, you permanently gain max health.

description.desc: Gain Bullet Shield, and reduce incoming bullet damage. After 6s or if the ability is reactivated, the shield explodes, dealing damage based on the remaining shield.

info_sections.loc_string: Gain Bullet Shield, and reduce incoming bullet damage. After 6s or if the ability is reactivated, the shield explodes, dealing damage based on the remaining shield.

description.desc:
Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} to manually create the explosion.
description.quip: Send out a Spirit Cat to grab enemies

Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.

description.desc:
Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage and slow on nearby enemies.
You may use Pounce on a second target if used within 3s
description.quip: Leap at your enemies
description.t1_desc: +1s Slow Duration
description.t2_desc: Reloads up to 20% of your ammo and applies +30% Fire Rate Slow.
description.t3_desc: +60 Damage and +1 Ability Charge.

description.desc: Deploy a Statue to track enemies in an area. The Ward will also attack enemies recently damaged by {s:hero_name}. Targeted enemies have reduced healing and heal {s:hero_name} when damaged.
description.quip: Deploy a statue that survey's an area
description.t1_desc: Statues gain Invisibility when not attacking.
description.t2_desc: +30s Duration and +20 DPS.
description.t3_desc: -30% Damage Reduction and -30% Heal Reduction on targets.

info_sections.loc_string: Deploy a Statue to track enemies in an area. The Ward will also attack enemies recently damaged by {s:hero_name}. Targeted enemies have reduced healing and heal {s:hero_name} when damaged.

description.desc: Mark your enemies and bathe yourself in shadow to strengthen your attacks and make yourself Invisible. Attacking will only temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)
description.quip: Enter the shadows to gain the advantage on your enemies
description.t2_desc: +40% Slow Resist while Active
description.t3_desc: Heavy Melee attacks cause Silence for 3s

info_sections.loc_string: Mark your enemies and bathe yourself in shadow to strengthen your attacks and make yourself Invisible. Attacking will only temporarily reveal you. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)

description.desc:
Turn to shadows and possess Ava. You gain bonus move speed and become hidden on the minimap, but cannot use your weapon or cast abilities.
ability melee : Pounce to break boxes.

When taking damage from an enemy hero, bonus move speed is reduced by 65% and you are unable to activate Ava for 6s.
description.quip: Take control of Ava
description.t3_desc: -20s Cooldown. Gain 35 Health Regen during Ava.

Turn to shadows and possess Ava. You gain bonus move speed and become hidden on the minimap, but cannot use your weapon or cast abilities.
ability melee : Pounce to break boxes.

When taking damage from an enemy hero, bonus move speed is reduced by 65% and you are unable to activate Ava for 6s.

Turn to Shadows, gaining movespeed and dealing delayed damage
description.t2_desc: +75.0 Damage. +20% Move Speed.
description.t3_desc: Refund all cooldowns and gain 24% Damage for 5ss.

description.quip: Dash forward and slash enemies
description.t3_desc: On Hero Hit: 50% Cooldown Refund

description.desc: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} or {g:citadel_binding:'Attack'} to hold the shot.
description.quip: Charge up a long range shot
description.t2_desc: +60.0 Damage
description.t3_desc: Improved damage scaling and -3s Charge Delay

info_sections.loc_string: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} or {g:citadel_binding:'Attack'} to hold the shot.

description.desc:
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'}for reduced jump height.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'}to cancel the glide.
description.quip: Jump high up in the air and unleash multishots
description.t2_desc: While airborne, +5 Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies 40% movement slow for 1.5s
description.t3_desc: While airborne, +30% Bullet Lifesteal and +30% Spirit Lifesteal

info_sections.loc_string:
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'}for reduced jump height.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'}to cancel the glide.

description.desc:
Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, applying Curse and Movement Slow that interrupts, Silences, Disarms, and prevents item usage.
Hit the trap with a Charged Shot to detonate early with increased radius.
description.quip: Place a trap that restricts enemy movement
description.t2_desc: Applies -15% Bullet Resist for 10s
description.t3_desc: +1s Curse Duration and +1.5m Radius

info_sections.loc_string:
Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, applying Curse and Movement Slow that interrupts, Silences, Disarms, and prevents item usage.
Hit the trap with a Charged Shot to detonate early with increased radius.

description.desc:
After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold{g:citadel_binding:'MoveForward'}to accelerate the owl.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'}to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.
description.quip: Fly your owl to damage enemies from afar
description.t3_desc: After hit, kills enemies that are below 22% Health

info_sections.loc_string:
After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold{g:citadel_binding:'MoveForward'}to accelerate the owl.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'}to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.

description.desc: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.
description.quip: Apply stacking bleed to the target
description.t3_desc: +40.0 Damage and +7.0 Bleed DPS

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.
Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full knives will ricochet to another enemy and apply a slow to enemies they bleed.

description.desc:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.
description.quip: Dash ahead, damaging all enemies along the path
description.t3_desc: Reduce cooldown by 2s per enemy hero hit (1s for Non-Hero). Max -8s per Dash.

info_sections.loc_string:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.

description.desc: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.
description.quip: Defer a portion of damage taken

info_sections.loc_string: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.
Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full the amount of damage deferred is increased.

description.quip: Travel to a low health hero and instantly kill it
description.t1_desc: Gain +2 m/s move speed while at full rage.
description.t2_desc: +5% Enemy Health Threshold and +8% Full Rage Bonus Damage
description.t3_desc: Finishing off an enemy with Killing Blow resets its cooldown.
description.active: Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the kill threshold, otherwise deal 200 damage to them.
description.passive: Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shiv gains increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.

info_sections.loc_string: Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the kill threshold, otherwise deal 200 damage to them.
Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shiv gains increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.

#ability_shieldguy_ability03_desc

description.desc: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to teleport to its location.
description.quip: Launch a damaging cloak that you can teleport to
description.t3_desc: +7 Weapon Damage for 10s after teleporting with Flying Cloak.

info_sections.loc_string: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to teleport to its location.

description.desc: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
description.quip: Briefly escape into your suitcase, then deal damage
description.t3_desc:
Applies -40% Fire Rate for 4.0s.
+0.5s Escape Duration

info_sections.loc_string: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.
#synth_grasp_desc

description.desc:
Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
description.quip: Air glide while firing multiple projectiles
description.t3_desc: +4% Amp Per Stack and 2m Radius

info_sections.loc_string:
Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.
#synth_blitz_desc

description.desc:
Deals damage and applies damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.
description.quip: Apply damage over time to enemies nearby
description.t2_desc: +4s Duration and suppresses targets' healing by -40%
description.t3_desc: +18.0 DPS and +6m Radius

info_sections.loc_string:
Deals damage and applies damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.

description.quip: Empower yourself and a nearby ally
description.t2_desc: +2.0m/s movement bonus

description.desc: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.
description.quip: Damage and slow enemies in the area
description.t3_desc: +46.0 DPS and +2m Radius

info_sections.loc_string: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.

description.desc: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.
description.quip: Turn into impervious stone and stun enemies nearby
description.t2_desc: +75.0 Damage and stuns for 0.5s.

info_sections.loc_string: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.

description.quip: Death from Above! Fly and drop an ally on enemies
description.t1_desc: -20% Bullet Resist on enemies hit for 8s
description.t2_desc: +200 Barrier and +5mm Explode Radius
description.t3_desc: Applies Silence on enemies hit for +3s

description.desc: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.
description.quip: Damage enemies and make a mess
description.t2_desc: +45.0 Damage and +1m Radius
description.t3_desc: Bounces 2 times

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.
Multiple hits to the same target deal less damage.
Goo puddles linger on the ground and apply a movement slow to enemies walking on them.

description.desc: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press {g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'} to escape early.
description.quip: The Cube is a safe place to be
description.t1_desc: Increases Move Speed and Stamina Recovery
description.t3_desc: Removes all Debuffs and -21.0s Cooldown

info_sections.loc_string: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press {g:citadel_binding:'Mantle'} to escape early.
After exiting the cube, the target has increased move speed and stamina recovery for a short duration.
#viscous_goo_puddle_desc

description.desc: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.
description.quip: Roll around and cause chaos
description.t3_desc: Can cast abilities and use items while rolling

info_sections.loc_string: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.

description.quip: Punch enemies with a giant fist
description.t2_desc: +30.0 Damage and +15% Movement Slow
description.t3_desc: -12.0s Cooldown and now deals Heavy Melee Damage

description.desc: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.
description.quip: Curse your target, rooting them if they don't escape
description.t3_desc: Warden deals +20% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for 6s

info_sections.loc_string: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.

description.desc: Gain a Barrier and bonus move speed.
description.quip: Gain a Barrier and move speed
description.t3_desc: +150 Barrier Health and now scales with Spirit Power

info_sections.loc_string: Gain a Barrier and bonus move speed.

description.desc: Throw a flask that damages and reduces the weapon damage and move speed of enemies it hits.
description.quip: Damage and debuff enemies nearby
description.t1_desc: Hit enemies lose 1 Stamina
description.t3_desc: -6.5s Cooldown and Weapon Debuff applies -35% Fire Rate

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a flask that damages and reduces the weapon damage and move speed of enemies it hits.

description.desc:
After charging for 2s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.
description.quip: Emit pulses that steal health from enemies
description.t2_desc:
+45.0 DPS
-30.0s Cooldown
description.t3_desc:
+50.0% Bullet Resist
+50.0% Spirit Resist
+2.5s Duration

info_sections.loc_string:
After charging for 2s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.

description.desc: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them, then slam them into the ground. Targets are silenced and disarmed afterwards.
description.quip: Lift an enemy, interrupting and silencing them
description.t3_desc: Telekinesis will bounce to an additional nearby target

info_sections.loc_string: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them, then slam them into the ground. Targets are silenced and disarmed afterwards.

description.desc: Teleport to the targeted location.
description.quip: Teleport to the targeted location
description.t2_desc: 300 Barrier for 5s. Barrier scales with Spirit Power.

info_sections.loc_string: Teleport to the targeted location.
#citadel_ability_psychic_daggers_desc

description.desc: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.
description.quip: Boost your fire rate
description.t3_desc: +15% Bullet and Spirit Lifesteal and Increased Scaling on Spirit Damage Per Bullet

info_sections.loc_string: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.

description.desc: Deal weapon damage to summon cards. Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
description.quip: Throw homing cards
description.t3_desc: +50% Card Summon Rate and Cards apply a 30% Slow for 1s.

info_sections.loc_string: Deal weapon damage to summon cards. Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.
#citadel_ability_psychic_pulse_desc

description.desc: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.
description.quip: Throw a ball of scrap that stuns enemies

info_sections.loc_string: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.

description.desc: Latches onto an Enemy, damaging them and healing yourself while attached. Targets must be in line of sight and within max range to stay latched. A successful kill also restores a Bio Blast charge.
description.quip: Consume an enemy trooper or neutral
description.t3_desc: +2 additional targets

info_sections.loc_string: Latches onto an Enemy, damaging them and healing yourself while attached. Targets must be in line of sight and within max range to stay latched. A successful kill also restores a Bio Blast charge.

description.desc: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.
description.quip: Shoot a blast of bio mass

info_sections.loc_string: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.

description.desc: Grabs any enemy looked at by Wrecker, putting them in stasis and holding them overhead. Stuns, and damages all captured enemies when finished. Any grabbed NPCs are salvaged.
description.t3_desc: Wrecker is Invulnerable during use

description.desc: Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.
description.quip: Launch a flying illusion of yourself, teleporting your real body where the illusion lands

info_sections.loc_string: Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.

description.desc: Create an area that slows nearby enemies and damages them after a channel. Damage scales with total channel time.
description.quip: Slow and Damage nearby enemies

info_sections.loc_string: Create an area that slows nearby enemies and damages them after a channel. Damage scales with total channel time.

description.desc: Create a large ball of scrap, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. Nearby enemies take reduced damage.

info_sections.loc_string: Create a large ball of scrap, damaging and stunning the first enemy hit. Nearby enemies take reduced damage.

description.desc:
Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'}or{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.
description.quip: Charge up an attack, dealing high damage on a full charge
description.t1_desc: Gain +60 Bullet Resist while channeling
description.t2_desc: -2s Ability Cooldown and apply 40% movement slow for 3s

info_sections.loc_string:
Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press{g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'}or{g:citadel_binding:'Attack'}to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.

description.desc: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.
description.quip: Fly towards an enemy target
description.t3_desc: Can Grapple to ally Heroes and +6 Weapon Damage for 10s

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.

description.desc: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.
description.quip: Damage enemies nearby, healing on hit

info_sections.loc_string: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.

description.desc:
Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster. You gain immunity to negative status effects and have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.
When you get a hero kill, you heal and the duration is extended.
description.quip: Become invincible and more powerful
description.t3_desc:
+3.0s Duration
+20% Bullet Resist
+20% Spirit Resist

info_sections.loc_string:
Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster. You gain immunity to negative status effects and have greatly increased bullet and spirit resist.
When you get a hero kill, you heal and the duration is extended.

description.desc: Throw a blade, dealing Spirit Damage. The blade then hooks back, applying Spirit Damage again and applying a Slow.
description.quip: Throw a blade that returns to you
description.t3_desc: Throw an additional 2 Daggers

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a blade, dealing Spirit Damage. The blade then hooks back, applying Spirit Damage again and applying a Slow.

description.desc: You have increased Slide Distance, can Slide up hills, and can turn faster while Sliding.
description.quip: Increase the agility of your Slide
description.t3_desc: +20% Spirit & Bullet Resist while Sliding

info_sections.loc_string: You have increased Slide Distance, can Slide up hills, and can turn faster while Sliding.

description.desc:
Inject a target with lethal venom. After a delay the venom triggers, dealing Spirit Damage. The damage is increased by the target's missing health.

Lethal Venom will ignore Petrify's damage block.
description.quip: Inject your enemies with a deadly venom
description.t3_desc: Bullets also build up Lethal Venom

info_sections.loc_string:
Inject a target with lethal venom. After a delay the venom triggers, dealing Spirit Damage. The damage is increased by the target's missing health.

Lethal Venom will ignore Petrify's damage block.

description.desc: Create a hexed area on the ground. After a delay, ALL units in the cylindrical area are Petrified. Enemies also suffer Spirit Damage. Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
description.quip: Turn both allies and enemies into stone

info_sections.loc_string: Create a hexed area on the ground. After a delay, ALL units in the cylindrical area are Petrified. Enemies also suffer Spirit Damage. Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.

description.desc: Throw a dagger, dealing Spirit Damage and applying a Fading Slow.
description.quip: Throw a slowing dagger
description.t3_desc: +2ss Slow Duration and remove 1 Stamina

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a dagger, dealing Spirit Damage and applying a Fading Slow.

description.desc:
Throw an explosive bola. On exploding, the bola Slows and Damages all enemies in the area.

Direct hits deal Additional Damage and Petrify instead. Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
description.quip: Toss a petrifying bola
description.t3_desc: +1.0s Petrify Duration. Petrifies all enemies in the area.

info_sections.loc_string:
Throw an explosive bola. On exploding, the bola Slows and Damages all enemies in the area.

Direct hits deal Additional Damage and Petrify instead. Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.
Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them, then slam them into the ground. Targets are silenced and disarmed afterwards.
Create a hexed area on the ground. After a delay, ALL units in the cylindrical area are Petrified. Enemies also suffer Spirit Damage. Petrified units block all damage, but cannot take actions.

description.desc:
Fire a bolt of magic that deals Damage, increasing as it travels. If you have an Assistant, they also cast Vexing Bolt at reduced damage.

Press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} to redirect the bolt towards your crosshairs.
description.quip: Launch a guided bolt of magic
description.t1_desc: Bolts apply -25% Fire Rate for 5s.
description.t3_desc: +140.0 Max Damage. +50.0% Assistant Damage.

info_sections.loc_string:
Fire a bolt of magic that deals Damage, increasing as it travels. If you have an Assistant, they also cast Vexing Bolt at reduced damage.

Press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability1'} to redirect the bolt towards your crosshairs.

Briefly become Untargetable before appearing at your destination. Your first 2 attacks deal bonus Spirit Damage.

[Cast] Appear at the target location.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} Appear in place.
Enemies will not know which cast you performed.

description.desc:
Hex a target, transforming them into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.
description.quip: Transform your enemy into a rabbit
description.t3_desc: Hex all enemies within 6m

info_sections.loc_string:
Hex a target, transforming them into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.

description.desc:
Create a Copy of yourself with reduced health and damage. When the clone dies or expires it explodes, dealing Spirit Damage.

The Copy cannot use their Ultimate ability.
description.t3_desc: Copy can cast their Ultimate Ability.

info_sections.loc_string:
Create a Copy of yourself with reduced health and damage. When the clone dies or expires it explodes, dealing Spirit Damage.

The Copy cannot use their Ultimate ability.

description.desc:
Summon an Assistant at the targeted location. The Assistant attacks whenever you fire your weapon, dealing Damage.

While the Assistant is out, you can press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to swap positions with your Assistant.

Casting Spectral Assistant also reloads your weapon.
description.quip: Summon your faithful assistant
description.t2_desc: +7s Duration & 5m Range
description.t3_desc: +60% Fire Rate and +14.0 Assistant Damage

info_sections.loc_string:
Summon an Assistant at the targeted location. The Assistant attacks whenever you fire your weapon, dealing Damage.

While the Assistant is out, you can press {g:citadel_binding:'Ability2'} to swap positions with your Assistant.

Casting Spectral Assistant also reloads your weapon.

description.desc: Target an enemy. You and the target enemy are bound on Stage, unable to leave. All other characters are pushed out of the radius.

info_sections.loc_string: Target an enemy. You and the target enemy are bound on Stage, unable to leave. All other characters are pushed out of the radius.

description.desc: Prepare three AMAZING bolts of magic. Each bolt applies a Fading Slow and deals Spirit Damage, increased for every bolt fired.
description.t3_desc: +50 Damage Per Bolt. Refund 1 Bolt per Kill

info_sections.loc_string: Prepare three AMAZING bolts of magic. Each bolt applies a Fading Slow and deals Spirit Damage, increased for every bolt fired.

description.desc:
Blink to the target location. On arrival, briefly gain movement speed and become Invisible.

[Cast] Appear at the target location.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} Appear in place.
Enemies will not know which cast you performed.

Blink to the target location. On arrival, briefly gain movement speed and become Invisible.

[Cast] Appear at the target location.
{g:citadel_binding:'AltCast'} Appear in place.

description.desc:
Copy the Ultimate of an enemy hero for a limited time. Reactivating the ability will use the Copied Ultimate instead.

Copies will inherit this ability's upgrade points.
Audience Participation will also copy the cooldown.
description.quip: Copy an enemy's Ultimate for a limited time
description.t1_desc: Upgrade the Copy.
description.t2_desc: Upgrade the Copy AGAIN!
description.t3_desc: Upgrade the Copy ONCE AGAIN!

info_sections.loc_string:
Copy the Ultimate of an enemy hero for a limited time. Reactivating the ability will use the Copied Ultimate instead.

Copies will inherit this ability's upgrade points.

description.desc:
Hex a target area and transforming all enemies into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.
Hex does not interrupt abilities.

Hex a target area and transforming all enemies into a Rabbit for a limited duration.

Rabbits are small and move faster, but take increased Damage and are unable to perform most actions.

description.desc: Throw a jar that leaves a spreading toxic pool. Enemies caught in the pool are Slowed and Silenced.
description.quip: Throw a poison jar
description.t3_desc: -25% Spirit Resist for enemies in the pool

info_sections.loc_string: Throw a jar that leaves a spreading toxic pool. Enemies caught in the pool are Slowed and Silenced.

description.desc:
Release a wave of spectral spiders that chase enemies and explode, dealing Spirit Damage.

Hit enemies are poisoned, temporarily losing Spirit and Spirit Resist. This effect can stack multiple times.
description.quip: Release a wave of spectral spiders
description.t2_desc: Additional -3 Spirit and -3% Spirit Resistance
description.t3_desc: Summon +5 Spiders

info_sections.loc_string:
Release a wave of spectral spiders that chase enemies and explode, dealing Spirit Damage.

Hit enemies are poisoned, temporarily losing Spirit and Spirit Resist. This effect can stack multiple times.

description.desc: Apply a Combat Barrier to a target ally and periodically deal Spirit Damage and Slows.
description.quip: Apply a damaging barrier

info_sections.loc_string: Apply a Combat Barrier to a target ally and periodically deal Spirit Damage and Slows.

description.desc:
Dealing Spirit Damage builds an increasing Slow. Once full, the buildup is consumed to apply an Immobilize and a burst of Spirit Damage.

This effect has a cooldown per target.

info_sections.loc_string:
Dealing Spirit Damage builds an increasing Slow. Once full, the buildup is consumed to apply an Immobilize and a burst of Spirit Damage.

This effect has a cooldown per target.

description.desc: Create a thread of web between two surfaces. Enemies who touch the web take Damage over time, become Slowed and are Revealed.
description.quip: Create a dangerous web
description.t3_desc: +2s Debuff Duration. The Web also Silences for 2.5s

Dealing Spirit Damage builds an increasing Slow. Once full, the buildup is consumed to apply an Immobilize and a burst of Spirit Damage.

description.desc: Use your umbrella to catch a gust of wind that lifts you backwards. You then charge up your umbrella to fire a projectile that explodes on impact.
description.t3_desc: [Not Yet Implemented]

info_sections.loc_string: Use your umbrella to catch a gust of wind that lifts you backwards. You then charge up your umbrella to fire a projectile that explodes on impact.

description.active: Active: Throw a concussion grenade that reduces enemies' turn rate.
description.passive: Passive: Deal bonus damage with your gun and melee attacks when hitting an enemy in the back.

info_sections.loc_string: Active: Throw a concussion grenade that reduces enemies' turn rate.
Passive: Deal bonus damage with your gun and melee attacks when hitting an enemy in the back.

description.desc: Activate your relic. Enemy heroes nearby have slowed movement and dashes, and receive damage over time when looking towards you. If enemies look at you long enough, they get cursed.

info_sections.loc_string: Activate your relic. Enemy heroes nearby have slowed movement and dashes, and receive damage over time when looking towards you. If enemies look at you long enough, they get cursed.

description.desc:
Throw a projectile, infused with an imp's spirit. It posseses the enemy, dealing Damage over time.

If the target dies while possessed, the imp jumps to another nearby enemy, refreshing its duration.
description.t3_desc: +25 DPS. Spreads to +1 targets after death.

info_sections.loc_string:
Throw a projectile, infused with an imp's spirit. It posseses the enemy, dealing Damage over time.

If the target dies while possessed, the imp jumps to another nearby enemy, refreshing its duration.

description.desc:
Performing a Dash or Slide loads your weapon with an empowered bullet that deals bonus Damage, equal to a percentage of your Weapon Damage.

If you're out of bullets, you'll find an extra one. How lucky.
description.t1_desc: Gain +2 m/s Move Speed while empowered
description.t2_desc: Deal an additional +25% weapon damage for 5s against the victim

Enemies can intercept the bullets.

description.desc:
Place two connected doors in the world. Players and most projectiles entering one door will exit out through the other. The doors will close at the end of the duration, or if the ability is activated again.

The two doors must be placed within the doorway distance of each other.

description.t3_desc:
+50m Doorway Distance
+30m Cast Range
